snippet.title: Quintus and the Formidable Curse | Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2440100/Quintus_and_the_Formidable_Curse/

Story Trailer for the upcoming video game 'Quintus and the Formidable Curse', a Horror-Adventure game following a Man and Mouse duo! This trailer reveals some plot points and new game play footage.

The game will follow on from ‘Quintus and the Absent Truth’, which was released on PC and all last and current gen consoles in 2022, our unlikely team are ready to take on a new adventure, which promises to be larger and far more dangerous than this couplings first outing.

The plot picks up right after the events of the original game, throwing Alan and Quintus into an adventure that only a Man/Mouse duo could overcome.

Official Website: https://www.wrecktangles.com/qatfc
